fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 gained 25.70 points or 0.14% to settle at 18,691.20. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, advanced 1.42% to 11.40. HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank and RIL were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The June 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 29 June 2023.
